author: Dennis Riungu
name: FlutterBuildApk
description: Build Android apk using Google's Flutter SDK

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the Flutter commands will be run from. Empty is the root of the repo. Example: $(system.defaultworkingdirectory)

inputs.name: targetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target folder/path where build results will be published. You can use variables. Example: $(build.artifactstagingdirectory)

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional arguments to use during the Flutter build process. For example, -v, etc. Keep in mind that these arguments will be appended to the 'Flutter build' command

inputs.name: runDebug
inputs.label: Run as debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use the debug build configuration, resulting to '--debug'. The default build configuration is 'release'

inputs.name: runTests
inputs.label: Run Tests
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, 'Flutter test' will be done before the build.

inputs.name: Clean
inputs.label: Clean
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, previously downloaded flutter runtimes will be removed. Otherwise, if there are exisiting Flutter runtimes they will be used.
